name: Trick-Or-Treat! - Beginners Game Jam2 Submission
description:
It is Halloween night and you only have a few houses left to hit up before the night is over! 

Yellow House: Oh no, they are stuck on the second floor due to a zombie invasion! They are throwing the candy to you from their second floor window and you must catch it!
- A and D to move. 

- If you catch the candy in the air +2 points, if you let it hit the ground +1 point(Because no one likes ground candy, but hey it's still candy!)

Green House: It seems no one is home? Or is this just a haunted maze? Either way, see if you can't find where they are stashing that good stuff!
- Mouse to move the camera 

- WASD to move your player.

Blue House: Is this some sort of cruel trick?! This house seems to think Apples are a good candy! Luckily it seems their rebellious teen is helping you out by tossing candy as well!
-A and D to move

-Space to throw a Bat(okay the graphic looks messed up)

- You'll want to hit away the apples, while letting the candy fall to safety behind you!

Orange House: Why, I've never seen anything like this, is it a construction zone? 
-A and D to move side to side

-SPACE to jump up. Maybe there's candy at the top?

Update: After finally playing it in WebGL as opposed to windows build - hot dang things get compressed and such for WebGL, I'm sorry everyone, it looks nicer/smoother on windows build
